Package org.cleverbus.core.common.contextcall

Classes for making calls between sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ContextCall Contract for calling method of service in sibling (Spring) context.
ContextCallRegistry Contract of registry calls for transferring calls' parameters and response between sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context.
 

Class Summary
AbstractContextCall Parent implementation of ContextCall interface, defines base behaviour.
ContextCallHttpImpl Implementation of ContextCall interface with HTTP client that calls ContextCallRoute.
ContextCallParams Encapsulates context call parameters.
ContextCallRegistryMemoryImpl Memory implementation of ContextCallRegistry interface.
ContextCallRoute Route that serves as input URI for calling from one Spring context to another context.
ReflectionCallUtils Helper class for calling target service via reflection.
 

Package org.cleverbus.core.common.contextcall Description

Classes for making calls between sibling Spring application contexts, specifically from web application context to Spring WS (Camel) application context.

See Also:
ContextCall
